DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the present study is to conduct a thorough and relevant physiology study of carriers and non-carriers of the gene variant X in order to determine the effect of the genetic variant on various metabolic parameters.
DOC.brief_title: Baseline Physiology Studies in Carriers of Gene Variant X Conferring Major Risk of CVD-prone Metabolic Disorders
DOC.criteria: Male 1870 years of age Member of Biobank Vejle BMI<30 Diabetes mellitus Severe illness
